name: Shuttle FTL
description:
The ultimate space travel.

Become the ultimate space pilot. Pace through the galaxy at blazing speeds. Put your reflexes to test.

Easy to learn, hard to master.

Use your Left and Right arrow keys to control the space ship. Avoid obstacles to score points and collect power-ups to score more points or make your game easier.

Test your endurance.

See how long you can keep the game going. Beat your own high score to become the ultimate space pilot.
